author: jih2nn
content: See the commit history. The tag is a commit hash.

author: jih2nn
content:
The Geth prototype has been updated to reflect the latest execution apis spec. In Kurtosis config, you can still use the Geth image of old version as follow: `el_image: jihoonsg/geth-focil:dffb273`

You can access the updated Geth image as follow and please refer to this [change log](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/609#issuecomment-3188627574): `el_image: jihoonsg/geth-focil:1a1adcd`

Hope this helps when rebasing FOCIL onto Fulu. cc <@1035747431461167125>  <@363800010518822915> <@993802539856314398> <@358120958726373381>
